hero.title: Movit
hero.subtitle: Exploration-Based Map App
hero.description: An innovative mobile application that lets you explore the real world and create your own personal map. Using GPS, you illuminate dark areas on the map and record where you've been on your adventures.

exploration.title: Exploration-Based Map Creation
exploration.description: Using GPS, only the places you actually visit are revealed on the map. Create your own unique exploration map.

tracking.title: Real-Time Location Tracking
tracking.description: Precise GPS location tracking unlocks explored areas in real-time. Every step you take is recorded.

privacy.title: Complete Privacy Protection
privacy.description: All data is stored only on your device. No personal information is stored on company servers.

record.title: Personal Exploration Records
record.description: Detailed records of explored distance, time, and newly discovered areas with comprehensive statistics.

download.title: Install Now
download.description: Install Movit now on Android and iOS to start your exploration!

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.line2: Purpleship aims to create services that break existing frameworks.
vision.line3: By implementing apps that only existed in imagination,
vision.line4: Our goal is to provide new experiences.

join.title: Join Us
join.line2: Contact us if you want to explore the unknown universe together.
join.line3: We welcome those who are passionate about discovering new worlds.

hero.title: WorldCanvas
hero.subtitle: Collaborative Canvas
hero.description: Stamp pixels on a shared canvas with people around the world—and finish an artwork together.

collab.title: Real-time collaboration
collab.description: Work together on the same canvas at the same time, with instant updates.

palette.title: Palette & pixels
palette.description: Pick colors, place pixels, and fill a massive canvas with the community.

fast.title: Fast controls
fast.description: A smooth UI to quickly navigate and work on the area you want.

download.title: Start Now
download.description: WorldCanvas is live. Place your pixels on a canvas shared by people around the world.

hero.title: Stampit
hero.subtitle: Membership Management App
hero.description: A smart mobile application for easily managing prepaid memberships, coupons, and vouchers with limited uses. Manage your complex memberships systematically in one place and never miss tracking your remaining uses.

register.title: Register & Manage Memberships
register.description: Easily register and manage prepaid memberships, vouchers, and coupons in one place.

check.title: Usage Tracking
check.description: Simply check off each visit to record usage and see your remaining count in real-time.

remaining.title: Check Remaining Uses
remaining.description: View remaining uses for each membership at a glance, so you never get confused.

integration.title: Unified Management
integration.description: Manage various types of memberships and vouchers conveniently in one integrated app.

expiry.title: Expiry Notifications
expiry.description: Receive alerts as expiration dates approach, so you never miss using your memberships.

history.title: Usage History
history.description: Check records of when you used which membership and analyze your usage patterns.

download.title: Install Now
download.description: Install Stampit on Android and iOS today to start managing your memberships smarter!
